servers.createOrJoin: Create or join a server to get started

servers.customizeDescription: Give your server personality with a name and icon. You can always change it later.
servers.serverTemplateDescription: Your server is where you and your friends hang out. Make yours and start chatting.
servers.publicServerDescription: Anyone can find and join this server
servers.nameMaxLength: Server name must be at most 100 characters

errors.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support microphone access
errors.audioDeviceNotSupported: Your browser does not support audio device detection
errors.audioOutputNotFound: Audio output device not found. Please connect headphones or speakers.
errors.permissionDenied: Microphone access permission denied. Please allow it in your browser settings.
errors.microphoneConnectRequired: Microphone device not found. Please connect a microphone.

userStatus.description: Choose your status to let others know if you're available, busy, or away.
userStatus.updateFailed: Failed to update user status. Please try again.

invite.title: Invite people to your server
invite.inviteFailed: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.

channel.createError: Channel creation failed. Please try again.
channel.title: Create a new channel
channel.description: Channels are where your members communicate. Create different channels for different topics.

text.label: Text Channel
text.desc: Send messages, images, GIFs, emojis, thoughts, and play with words

voice.label: Voice Channel
voice.desc: Meet via voice calls, video, and screen sharing

announcement.label: Announcement Channel
announcement.desc: Create a space for organized discussions

channel.privateChannelDescription: Only selected members and roles will be able to view this channel.
channel.channelNameMinLength: Channel name must be at least {{min}} character
channel.channelNameMaxLength: Channel name must be at most {{max}} characters
